<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ward Against Corruption](/Feats.aspx?ID=5755) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=751" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your soul is warded against the power of undeath and plague, as well as that of the evil former psychopomps known as [sahkils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=208). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), and all effects from [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) or [sahkils](/Traits.aspx?ID=333). This bonus increases to +2 against an undead or sahkil's death effect or disease.
name: Ward Against Corruption
